    public class Human
extends ZombieActor
    Class representing an ordinary human.

      • Human

        protected Human(java.lang.String name,
                char displayChar,
                int hitPoints)
        The protected constructor can be used to create subtypes of Human, such as the Player
        Parameters:
        name - the human's display name
        displayChar - character that will represent the Human in the map
        hitPoints - amount of damage that the Human can take before it dies
